Arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
Translation: And We made from water every living thing.
Explanation: Modern biology confirms that water is essential for all known forms of life. Cells, the basic units of life, are mostly composed of water.

Arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الإِنسَانَ مِن سُلالَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ...
Translation: We created man from an extract of clay... then We made him into a drop in a secure place...
Explanation: Describes stages of embryonic development, aligning with modern embryology in terms of sequence and stages.
Washing hands, face, and feet regularly (wudu) is proven to reduce infections and promote health.

Arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ * خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
Translation: Let man consider from what he is created. He is created from a gushing fluid.
Explanation: Describes the role of gushing fluid (seminal fluid) in human creation, corresponding with reproductive biology.

Arabic: إِذَا قُمْتَ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَأَسْبِغِ الْوُضُوءَ
Translation: When you get up for prayer, perform the ablution properly.
Explanation: Ritual washing has shown psychological calming effects, reducing stress and increasing mindfulness before prayer.

Arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا * وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
Translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place? And the mountains as pegs?
Explanation: Mountains have deep roots that stabilize the Earth's crust, much like pegs hold down tents.

Arabic: وَأَوْحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحْلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِى مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا...
Translation: And your Lord inspired the bee, saying: 'Build your homes in the hills, on the trees, and in (men's) habitations.'
Explanation: Describes bee behavior and honey’s healing properties, confirmed by science.

Translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.
Explanation: Refers to the expanding universe, discovered by modern astronomy (Hubble's Law).

Arabic: أَوْ كَظُلُمَاتٍ فِي بَحْرٍ لُّجِّيٍّ يَغْشَاهُ مَوْجٌ...
Translation: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves...
Explanation: Describes internal waves in deep seas, a concept discovered only in the 20th century.

Arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
Translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature.
Explanation: Human body is anatomically and physiologically balanced; bipedal structure is a marvel of biology.
